name: brawlTidesOfWarObjects
description:
Modified Tides of War objects used by template Brawl, should be better suited for short games on small maps.
Bone Pillar: defended by 7x 1-3 Ghosts, reward: 1000-2000 Gold, 2-4 Ghosts
Outpost of Souls: defended by 7x 1-2 Power Liches, reward: 1 Demilich or Minor Phylactery
Phantom Ship: defended by 7x 1-3 Dread Skippers, reward: 2-4 Dread Skippers and 1000-2000 Gold on land, 4-8 Dread Skippers and 1500-2500 Gold on water (because getting to any object on water requires a turn of boarding)
Scriptorium: defended by 5x 1-3 Monks (guard count lowered 10 times), rewards (Gold rewards halved, rest of rewards left untouched): 1/2/3/4 Gems, 0/2/3/4 Crystals, 0/0/3/4 Sulfur and 0/0/0/4 Mercury, a Level 1 or 2 Spell, 1250/1625/2000/2750 Gold, Artifacts: none/Minor/Minor/Treasure+Major
Seminarium: defended by 5x 6/8/10 Pikemen, rewards: 3/4/5 Swordmen or 1 Templar instead of the 5 Swordmen
Sorceress Castle: guarded by 3/4 Tritons, 2/0 Mermaids, 2/3 Dryads, 2/3 Succubi, 2/3 Werewolves, 1/2 Illithids, 1/2 Troll Hag and 0/1 Coatl, rewards: a Level 3 Spell, a Level 2 or 4 Spell, a Statue of Legion component, a Coruncopia component or a Golden Goose component or Wood and Ore Carts
All banks recharge after 4 full days pass.
They are not designed to be taken with your whole army but with parts of your army in multiple places at once.
author: Warzyw647

chinese.name: Brawl模板战争之潮小物件
chinese.description:
专为Brawl模板定制的改良版战争之潮模组物件，适用于小型地图。
骸骨立柱：由7队每队1-3恶灵守卫，奖励1000-2000金币和2-4恶灵。
灵魂哨所：由7队每队1-2尸巫王守卫，奖励为1个半巫妖或初级魂器。
幽灵船：在陆地上时，由7队每队1-3恐怖船长守卫，奖励2-4恐怖船长和1000-2000金币；在水上时，由于需要一回合的时间来登船，因此奖励4-8恐怖船长和1500-2500金币。
书院：由5队每队1-3僧侣守卫（守卫数量减少至十分之一），奖励（金币奖励减半，其余奖励保持不变）为1/2/3/4颗宝石、0/2/3/4块水晶、0/0/3/4份硫磺和0/0/0/4个水银，一个1级或2级魔法，1250/1625/2000/2750金币，以及宝物奖励：无/中级宝物/中级宝物/低级宝物+高级宝物。
修会：由5队每队6/8/10枪兵守卫，奖励为3/4/5个剑士，或者用1个圣堂武士代替5个剑士。
女巫城堡：由3/4个海卫兵、2/0个异教徒、2/3个林妖、2/3个魅魔、2/3个变狼人、1/2个摄魂怪、1/2个洞穴巫女和0/1个风蛇守卫，奖励为一个3级魔法、一个2级或4级魔法、天赐神兵组件、丰收之角组件或金鹅组件，或者木材车和矿石车。
所有可升级的生物，无论是守卫还是奖励生物，都可能出现升级后的生物。
所有宝屋每4天刷新一次。
这些物件不是设计来让你用全部兵力去攻打的，而是让你分散成多支小股部队同时攻打多处地点。
